title: Computer Science Education Design Strategies Using Pen-Based Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Computer Science Foundations and Familiarity with Tablet/Digital Pen Usage
context.additional_context: For corporate training managers/leaders, strengthening competencies to implement Pen-Based Technology (PBT) in mathematics and engineering fields

learning_goals: Design educational applications of PBT (Problem-Based Training) using concept map-based instructional strategies
Create interactive content for mathematical concept explanations using digital ink tools
Derive improvement directions for PBT-based instructional models through formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
